lead_paragraph: HEISLER--Donald, 83 years old, died peacefully at home on May 6, 2016. Beloved husband of Deena. Devoted father of Rachel and Joel Sheinfeld, Abram Heisler and Riva Silverman and Eliot and Erica Heisler. Cherished and fun-loving grandfather of Gabrielle, Nathan, Shoshana, Naomi, Jacob, Adina, Amanda, James, Jason and Chloe. Respected dentist for over 50 years. President of Congregation Ohab Zedek in Belle Harbor. A kind and gentle man, beloved by all who knew him. Services 12 Noon on Sunday, May 8, 2016 at Riverside-Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza (Opp. LIRR), Great Neck, NY. Interment to follow at Baron Hirsch Cemetery, Staten Island, NY. 1/3
